title: Long wait times for a new player (Lvl 7)
body:
So I got into lol a few weeks ago, because Counter-Strike just got way to toxic and there are so many hackers.

I hop into a few bot games that take 20 seconds max to find a match, while PvP non-ranked takes over 20 minutes when it used to be 5 minutes.

Riot please add more servers or do something, I dont care about finding _The perfect match_ . All I care is that I get into a match and have some fun.

replies.body: It's probably because it's trying to match you up with other newbies (which these days, there are not a lot of) and it also does not help that OCE has a really small player base

of the 4 people I know below lvl30, only 2 are newbies and the other 2 are remaking accounts since they are either making a smurf or were permabanned for toxicity. But yeah newbies are rare and alot of the low level people are either externally scripted bots 80% of the time, alternate handlevel tertiary accounts 15% or actual newbies who have decided foolhardishly to enter this toxic community 5% of the time.
Add more servers? Everyone in Australia is supposedly on the same server as you. It's just that there's not many low level people here.

I feel like adding more servers would just increase wait times for newbies since a low number of players here is what creates the issue with match waits. However I do feel like having more servers might be a good idea since even as a 5man premade ranging from lvl1 to high Platinum with friends queing for co-op vs ai the other day we still had to deal with a substantial wait time for server space for our mentoring sesh and trying to get each other killed by the beginner bots (we managed to kill our high platinum friend by suddenly abandoning him under nexus towers among 5 angry beginner bots XD ).
you moved to LoL because CS:GO was too toxic? srsly? LoL is even more toxic, especially OCE server.

Im a newbie to, playing for about 2months. I find if the queue goes for more than 5mins i close it and re-queue and generally only wait 2-3mins. If ur playing late at night it takes longer because there arent as many people on to match up with
